name: The Catacombs (Ludzik)
description:
Story

You've explored caves since you were kid, this time not everything went like you wanted.

Note

Warning: this game contains flashing lights

For best experience play with headphones on, loud, in a dark room.

Settings

Movement - WASD

Looking around - Mouse

Enter interaction - Left Click

The only setting that can be adjusted is the sensitivity located in the pause menu.

Developer Note

Hello this game is developed only by me, this is my second horror game. It should take around 5-10 minutes to finish game. Feel free to message me on my discord Ludzik#4958 to let me know feedback or future ideas.
